frontmatter.title: AWS ElastiCache
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative and visual infrastructure as design for AWS ElastiCache
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Collaboratively manage infrastructure with your coworkers synchronously sharing the same designs.
featureList: Add a cache to your relational database
You can create an ElastiCache Serverless cache in a few steps by specifying a cache name in Meshery
